body.p: This page gives the Oracc PUA signs in Oracc PUA section 9.5 which contains glyphs for Archaic Cuneiform Numerals (ACN) which possibly will be encoded, either in ACN or in Proto-Cuneiform (PC). This does not guarantee that any or every glyph actually will be encoded.
See the Oracc PUA page for notes on the columns in this table..
See the ACN Concordance page for ACN-specific abbreviations used in the notes in this table.
